projects.title: Xcrypto-App!
projects.description: This is a crypto web App where you can check the all crypto currency present in the market with real time market price and the scaling percentage of the of the crypto currency with total market cap.

projects.title: Periodic Table Of Elements
projects.description: The periodic table is a tabular course of action of the chemical components by increasing atomic number which shows the components with the goal that one may see slants in their properties.

projects.title: ToDo List (ReactJS - Firebase DB)
projects.description: This is a simple To-Do List web application built with React and Firebase for user authentication. With this app, you can create and manage your to-do tasks securely using Firebase authentication. It provides a responsive and intuitive user interface for managing your tasks.
